=Portable Executable 101 - a windows executable walkthrough=

https://corkami.googlecode.com/svn/wiki/pics/blah.png

This graphic ([http://corkami.googlecode.com/files/PE101-v1.PDF PDF] [http://corkami.googlecode.com/files/PE101-v1.png PNG]) is a walkthrough of a *[http://corkami.googlecode.com/files/PE101.zip simple windows executable]*, showing its dissected structures, then explaining how it's loaded by the operating system.

https://corkami.googlecode.com/svn/wiki/pics/simple_executable.png

this file was *entirely written by hand* to be concise (standard PEs contain more informations that are not essential for such a first introduction). 

https://slideshare.goin/blah.pdf
